evals.prompt: I want to generate a fashion e-commerce photo of a woman wearing a silk blouse. I want the Hasselblad X2D medium format look with the XCD 80mm f/1.9 lens. Kodak Portra 160 film aesthetic. Write me the perfect prompt for Nano Banana Pro.
expectations: Output contains a complete, ready-to-use prompt for AI image generation
Mentions Hasselblad X2D and XCD 80mm f/1.9 explicitly
Includes medium format specific characteristics (shallow DOF, dimensionality, 16-bit tonal transitions)
References HNCS skin rendering or equivalent Hasselblad color science description
Includes Kodak Portra 160 characteristics (pastel muted tones, fine grain, rosy skin tones, low contrast)
Describes bokeh quality specific to this lens/camera combo
Contains lighting direction or style suggestion

evals.prompt: I need a moody night street photography prompt. CineStill 800T look with red halation. Shot on Leica M11 with Noctilux 50mm f/0.95. Make it cinematic and atmospheric.
expectations: Output contains complete prompt with all requested equipment mentioned
CineStill 800T red halation is prominently described (not just mentioned by name)
Leica Noctilux f/0.95 extreme shallow DOF characteristics are described
Includes tungsten blue cast and warm practical light characteristics
Mentions specific bokeh character (large round orbs, swirl character, glow)
Heavy vignette characteristic of Noctilux is mentioned
Night/urban atmosphere and mood descriptors are included
Film grain is described

evals.prompt: Generate a cinematic widescreen anamorphic prompt. ARRI ALEXA 35 with Cooke Anamorphic SF 40mm. Kodak Vision3 500T film look. Sci-fi corridor scene.
expectations: Output specifies 2x anamorphic or 2.39:1 aspect ratio
Oval/elliptical bokeh is described
Horizontal lens flare streaks (blue/amber) are mentioned
ARRI ALEXA 35 color science characteristics included
Cooke warm tone character mentioned alongside anamorphic traits
Kodak Vision3 500T grain and tungsten blue cast described
Edge softness and field curvature from anamorphic mentioned
Sci-fi atmosphere and cinematic composition described

evals.prompt: I want to create an editorial portrait with vintage character. Use the Helios 44-2 swirl bokeh lens on a modern camera. Fujifilm Nostalgic Neg color treatment. Golden hour.
expectations: Helios 44-2 swirl bokeh specifically described (rotating background pattern)
Warm/golden color cast of the lens mentioned
Halation and bloom characteristics included
Chromatic aberration at edges described
Heavy vignette mentioned
Nostalgic Neg amber/golden warm color cast characteristics described
Golden hour lighting described to complement the warm aesthetic
Complete usable prompt structure

evals.prompt: Compare the Cooke S7/i vs ARRI Signature Primes for a beauty commercial. Which gives a warmer, more organic look? Write prompts for both so I can compare.
expectations: Two distinct prompts are generated, one for each lens
Cooke S7/i prompt emphasizes the Cooke Look (golden warmth, creamy round bokeh)
ARRI Signature prompt emphasizes modern perfection (clean, minimal distortion, large bokeh at T1.8)
Differences between the two are clearly articulated
Both prompts are complete and usable
Recommendation about which is warmer/more organic is provided (Cooke)
Camera body pairing is appropriate for each lens

evals.prompt: Black and white gritty street photography prompt. Kodak Tri-X look. Shot on Fujifilm X100VI. I want maximum grain and contrast.
expectations: Kodak Tri-X 400 characteristics explicitly described (pronounced grain, high contrast, deep blacks)
Fujifilm X100VI with 23mm f/2 (35mm equiv) perspective mentioned
Heavy grain structure emphasized as requested
High contrast treatment described
Street photography composition and atmosphere included
Black and white rendering specifics (tonal range, shadow/highlight handling) described
Complete usable prompt
